name: nightmod black - global [colour edit]
description:
this is a colour edit of:
https://userstyles.org/styles/131999/nightmod-black-global-theme
a dark, grey/black theme for night time web browsing.

i tested approx twenty-five dark themes on userstyles, looking for one that didn't break features on websites.
unlike the large majority of dark themes on userstyles.org this nightmod theme uses clever things like transparent backgrounds, so parts of the page aren't 'lost'

what's different from the original: the links are yellow, the main text colour is lighter, and the backgrounds are darker. in addition, the new tab page is black, and the hovered links are stylized.

discussions.name: Works where many others fail, but...
